stanza.line: How careful was I when I took my wayway
Each trifle under truest bars to thrustthrust
That to my use it might unused staystay
From hands of falsehood in sure wards of trusttrust
But thou to whom my jewels trifles areare
Most worthy comfort now my greatest griefgrief
Thou best of dearest and mine only carecare
Art left the prey of every vulgar thiefthief
Thee have I not locked up in any chestchest
Save where thou art not though I feel thou artart
Within the gentle closure of my breastbreast
From whence at pleasure thou mayst come and partpart
And even thence thou wilt be stoln I fearfear
For truth proves thievish for a prize so deardear
